item.title: Thought Questions - questions worth asking
item.description:
One of the pages I follow using RSS is Codebetter, and today there was a blog post about questions that make you think by Dru Sellers. If could almost be considered a personal retrospective. It linked to a blog post on the Wake Up Tiger blog, and a web page called Thought Questions where there are lots of questions that will make you think. They got me thinking.

The page is now added to my RSS feed and I’ll give each new question a few minutes of thought. As the Wake Up Tiger blog post say:

“If life begins at the end of your comfort zone — as indeed it does …”

it’s not a bad idea to ask yourself some hard questions that will get you out of your comfort zone.
